content:
Description

Basic introduction into this magic system or type

System

For magic system with categorization e.g. Air, Earth, Fire & Water are types of Bending.

Distribution

  • The races or species that may posses or use this ability
  • Prevalence: The percentage of the race/species or demographics who have it, 

Rules

How the magic system works, the requirements e.g. genetics, certain time of the day, objects or artefacts that allows or amplifies the ability.

Importance

The significance of the ability in the society or the story

Improvements

How does someone gets better e.g. age, training, stealing it from other people

Ranking

Defining position or status e.g. trainee, master, grandmaster

Merit

The advantages to having this ability and possible use

Weakness

How the ability can be exploited by opponents

Drawbacks

Negative effect of the ability e.g. shorter lifespan, "losing ones' soul"

Limitations

Restrictions based on law, biology or any other means e.g. a user can only use their ability at night or for just 5 continous minutes per day.

Moves

Specific gestures or act e.g. list of spells, unique body movements

Possible additions

Under the maybe or not sure column
